Text: I followed the instructions word for word only to get a message saying this: "It has come to our attention that you have installed another Sims expansion pack after The Sims Makin' Magic. For this to work properly, The Sims Makin' Magic installer will now update your installation. Select OK to proceed." I hit okay but this message just keeps popping up. I don't know what It means, or what I should do. I'm using Windows 7.
